achraf_hakimi.bio: Fast, attack-minded full-back known for overlapping runs and excellent crossing.

Mohamed Salah.bio: Clinical goalscorer with excellent dribbling and pace on the right wing.

Riyad Mahrez.bio: Creative winger with a silky first touch and set-piece ability.

Yankuba Minteh.bio: Young, quick winger with promising dribbling and attacking instincts.
